languages.text: The character's STR is increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Increases the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +10 in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.
